DOC.detailed_description: Xerostomia ( dry mouth ) common late complication radiation therapy head neck cancer . When patient cure survive several year , xerostomia often become quite bothersome ; affect quality life . This study compare effectiveness seven over-the-counter remedy , 2 rinse , 3 spray 2 chew gum . A computer program make random assignment patient physician choose order product try . The remedy use one week end period patient fill questionaire .
